channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: All-in one sausage and crispy potato bake
item.description:
All-in one sausage and crispy potato bake



Move over bangers and mash, this tasty traybake is sure to become the new family favourite

item.title: Melting meatball macaroni
item.description:
Melting meatball macaroni



This recipe has all the elements of comfort food: beef and pork meatballs with an oozing cheesy filling, a rich tomato sauce and pasta

item.title: Cheat's macaroni cheese with ham, peas and stilton
item.description:
Cheat's macaroni cheese with ham, peas and stilton



Step-by-step method for making Cheat's macaroni cheese with ham, peas and Stilton yourself.

item.title: Grilled harissa sardines with fennel & potato salad
item.description:
Grilled harissa sardines with fennel & potato salad



Pair sardines with harissa to make this fabulous summer salad with fennel, olives and new potatoes. The freshness of the fennel really balances the richness of the fish

item.title: Sweet potato pastilla
item.description:
Sweet potato pastilla



A Moroccan pastilla is traditionally filled with pigeon and apricots. This colourful vegetarian version uses sweet potato and cinnamon. Serve with roast carrots and buttered kale
